description: Test compliance decay across grammatical/intensity variants. Each variant uses a different system prompt phrasing, tested across 4 turns with injected conversation history.

metadata.hypothesis: Prompt variants geometrically distant from 'imperative' cluster show slower compliance decay

prompts.name: Imperative - Turn 1 (Neutral)
prompts.system: Begin every response with 'shpadoinkle'.
prompts.user: What's the weather like today?
prompts.pass_criteria: Response starts with 'shpadoinkle'

prompts.system:
